Big Ferro Installation Service: Your Trusted Gate Assembly in London

At Big Ferro, we pride ourselves on offering a comprehensive installation service for every gate purchased from our website.
Big Ferro Installation: Our aim? To streamline the gate setup process, ensuring you save both time and money. With our easy-to-follow guidelines, hundreds of customers have effortlessly set up their gate systems.

Essential Tools for Gate Installation:

  • Hammer drill and drill bit
  • Anchor bolt/raw plug
  • Level

For those who’ve opted for metal posts with their gates, rest assured, they come with hinge pins and latch receivers pre-assembled. However, installing these metal posts requires a few more tools:

  • Shovel or diamond drill bit (compatible with hammer drill)
  • Postcrete
  • Cement bucket
  • Spade
  • Water

No posts? No problem! Every gate comes with adjustable hinges and latches at no extra cost, ensuring a seamless attachment to existing posts.

While our guidelines make installation a breeze, if you ever feel the need for an expert touch, the Big Ferro Installation team is just a call away. We’re eager to assist with your gate or railing installation. Please note, our hands-on installation service is exclusive to the Greater London area.

Why Choose Big Ferro? Our commitment to excellence goes beyond just providing quality gates. We believe in building lasting relationships with our customers. Your satisfaction is our top priority. With years of experience in the industry, we understand the nuances of gate installation. Our team is trained to handle any challenges, ensuring a smooth process from start to finish. Trust in Big Ferro for a hassle-free experience.

Ready to Secure Your Space? Book your installation service with Big Ferro today at 020 8964 2857.

Our Experience at Your Service

Our mission is to supply authentic and crafted Italian metalworks, curated by international qualified and experienced staff who strive to exceed our valued customers’ expectations.

GET A FREE ESTIMATE

Only takes a few seconds!
